resources.string: A value, in terms of g (9.81 m/s^2), that the sum of all non-gravitational forces on the phone must exceed for it to lock.
Must be checked for app to function. Uncheck this before uninstalling.
That threshold is too low. Trust me.
PluckLock was about to lock your device, but PluckLock must be device administrator to do this. Add PluckLock to the device administrators in the settings.
